Thandi Ndlovu (1953/1954 - Ọgọst 24, 2019) bụ dọkịta South Africa na nwanyị ọchụnta ego nke amara nke ọma dị ka onye tọrọ ntọala nke Motheo Construction Group
A mụrụ Ndlovu na Soweto, South Africa ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Orlando
Na 1976, mgbe ọ ka bu nwa akwụkwọ na Mahadum Fort Hare, Ndlovu banyere n'agha iji gbanarị nlebara anya nke ọrụ nchekwa nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ

N'agbata 1977 na 1984, Ndlovu sonyeere African National Congress dị ka onye otu Umkhonto we Sizwe   nke na-arụ ọrụ na mpụga South Africa, si Mozambique gaa Zambia, wee banye n'ebe ndịda Angola, ebe ọ nwetara ọzụzụ; Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ maka Òtù Ndị Kọmunist Na-eto Eto na Moscow, USSR
Na 1984 ọ debanyere aha na Mahadum Zambia ka ọ mụọ ihe gbasara ọgwụ bekee, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ laghachiri South Africa wee banye n'ụlọ ọgwụ Baragwanath na Soweto

Ka ọ na-eme ihe gbasara ọgwụ bekee na South Africa, Ndlovu chọpụtara na ọtụtụ n'ime ọrịa ndị dị n'etiti ndị ọrịa a kpotara ya sitere na Orange Farm metụtara ọnọdụ ibi ndụ dara ogbenye n'ihi enweghị ụlọ zuru oke, nke mere ka ọ tọọ ntọala Motheo Construction na 1997
Achọpụtara ya maka ikike ya ịbanye n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ihe owuwu South Africa nke ụmụ nwoke na-achị, yana maka ịzụlite Motheo ka ọ bụrụ nnukwu ụlọọrụ na-ewu ụlọ gọọmentị,  na-arụ ụlọ karịrị pụkụ iri asatọ
Ndlovu nwụrụ n'ihe mberede nke okporoụzọ na 24 Ọgọst 2019 ka ọ na-aga olili ozu na Rustenburg, North West Province
